name: Domain of Blessing: Forsaken Rampart I
description:
A border city that used to provide shelter for desert folk displaced in an epidemic. Now, a new group of vagrants has taken up residence within its walls.
If you repel the infesting monsters with the blessing of Dendro, you might be rewarded valuable artifacts.
disorder: When a party member triggers a Dendro-related Elemental Reaction, the Elemental Mastery of all party members is increased by 150 for 8s. This effect can be triggered at most once every 1s.
